title: Hams that couldn't be cured
creator_credit: Walter Lantz, United World Films and Castle Films
brief_description: Animated film telling the “Three Little Pigs” tale from the Big Bad Wolf’s point of view, with the pigs as tough jazzing beatniks. Similar to the Warner cartoon “Three Little Bops”.
